text:
@realDonaldTrump @SpeakerPelosi @BarackObama @JoeBiden & dems have used the suffering of people via COVID-19 & racist act against George Floyd to:
- Attack Trump over crisis response
- Stifl trade deal w/ China 
- Sow division w/ black voters
- Sow division w/ military personnel 
Don’t be fooled
